title: STILL SALTY ABOUT MA IVERN SKINS
body:
I NEED MY CHRISTMAS TREE IVERN AND I NEED IT NOW {{sticker:sg-shisa}} 

I shalt not rest until Ivern gets a decent skin! RITO MUST LISTEN TO OUR CALLS

replies.body: Maybe in 3018
doubt it tbh
Candy King Ivern is just disturbing.  Give lanky tree boi a skin that doesn’t induce nightmares pls.

Me; Watches Saw
Me: Is fine
Me: Looks at candy king ivern
Also me: **cant sleep for weeks**
But the Recall is the best in the game! (Just barely ahead of Oktoberfest Grag)

I need 

Candy Kayne
Chrismas Evelyn 
And yea Boi {{champion:427}}
{{champion:57}}  You jelly?

I honestly thought riot would do a christmas tree Ivern skin

BUT I GUESS NOT {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

Ivern has the fourth lowest pick rate in the game, though.

Perhaps you could buy a Pajama Guardian skin, instead? :^)

Why don't we make another Lux or Ahri skin instead?

We all know you want more of them, right?
Never understood why Lux and Ahri are problem children when MF has 12 skins an ultimate and a set chromas,  and the longest she's ever gone between skins is under 11 months.

> [{quoted}](name=Sexy Jack Rabbit,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IKlBytfE,comment-id=000d00010000,timestamp=2018-12-02T13:30:37.294+0000)
>
> Never understood why Lux and Ahri are problem children when MF has 12 skins an ultimate and a set chromas,  and the longest she's ever gone between skins is under 11 months.

Let us not count Pyjama Guardian as a skin and accept it for what it is: an overglorified chroma.

Hopefully Riot learns from the backlash those skins got and never does something like that again (especially not in such an obvious cash-grab manner), unless it's a special case like the Blitzcrank or Leona skins.

But yes, besides that, MF is tied with Annie and surprisingly, Alistar, for the most skins in the game. At least the latter two have the excuse of being release champions (and most of Alistar's early skins are chromas).

It's less an overglorified Chroma and more just a 750 remodel. 
Considering it's literally priced at that if you earn the prior skins.

> [{quoted}](name=Stardûst,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IKlBytfE,comment-id=000d0001,timestamp=2018-12-02T10:34:56.815+0000)
>
> Why don't we make another Lux or Ahri skin instead?
> 
> We all know you want more of them, right?

Good idea. We can never have enough Lux or Ahri skins. They sell like hot cakes.
Pajama Guardian Ivern?
We the Ivern players are gonna have to face the facts:  there will never be another Ivern skin.  It's just the way it is.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

What’s that? Christmas Ivern, you say?

WELL OF COURSE! ANOTHER YI SKIN COMING RIGHT UP!

Well of course, we all love our Yi skins!


*cries in a corner*

I totally wanted them to make a Festive Ivern  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}  but NOOOO.

Gotta wait and hope he gets something next year.
I very rarely like playing Ivern, but yeah, he needs a skin. Camille and Kled released after him and got skins before him. Taliyah too.

Taliyah was released 5 months prior to Ivern, Kled was released 2 months beforehand. So it makes sense they'd each get a skin.  
Noteworthy is both were legacy too.
See my problem is that he's the only jungler I DO enjoy. My backups are Eve and Hecarim and I always end up feeding with them lol
I just find him kind of boring, but I did enjoy the last game I played as him. My main junglers are Olaf, Kindred, and my favorite, NUNU! And Willump. & Knuckles.
no we need candy kayn
That would be perfect, but kayn JUST got a skin for odessey.

> [{quoted}](name=Erol The Nomad,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IKlBytfE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-12-01T19:22:17.782+0000)
>
> Instead how about a Freljord skin since that's Ivern's origin anyway, or a Giving Tree skin, or a Beanstalk skin duo'd with someone dressed as Jack!  I don't want to see my baby tarnished with tacky christmas marketing, they can do so much better than that.

Problem with that is when he was in the freljord he was human. xD and Freljords don't have any kind of distinct look other than being blue.

> [{quoted}](name=Erol The Nomad,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IKlBytfE,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2018-12-03T04:43:29.127+0000)
>
> I was actually hoping for a human Ivern in that idea.  They have pre-metamorphasis skins for {{champion:112}} and {{champion:38}} I would get it for sure.

Yes but the human would look silly since when he became a tree his limbs stretched out. If you shrink him to be human size or what he used to be it would fuck with his hitbox so much. Unless you are saying instead of going with his personality when he was human make it so he has stilts and looks like a clown. But then that is not freljord.
I support that idea
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Festive Ivern will probably Come out in the same lot as Candy Kayn. aka next year or likely never.
Your Ivern.... SKINS??????

You would think after they touched base on all the champions that came out last year ({{champion:141}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:240}}{{champion:497}} {{champion:498}}  ) that Ivern would have been among them xD
I remember riot saying that Ivern was one of the champs that would get a skin by the end of the year, but here i sit, disappointed, yet not surprised
Who?
Y U NO SANTA ORNN?!?!?!

I totally wanted them to make a Festive Ivern  {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}  but NOOOO.

Gotta wait and hope he gets something next year.

Ivern isn't a very popular champion. Last, I read Twitch jungle is more popular than Ivern. Ivern has 0.1% pick rate. His character requires two models per skin. Unless Riot is interested in losing money, I don't think Ivern  will ever get a skin.
